title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7581 (December 2nd, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update Version: 4.0.7581  Released on: December 2nd, 2013


Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary 


Changelog:

-------


B] Pets/Mounts

Fixed the Porcupette guide to only include those dailies that reward you with the Sack of Pet Supplies

[B] Leveling

Swamp of Sorrows:

Fixed confusion regarding the swim tonic in the beginning of the guide

[B] Professions

Changed the farming of Medium Leather and Hides to be more effective

Moved the location of the Mining 150-200 to a more efficient route

Pandaria Mining paths modified to keep you from Horde / Alliance towns


[B] General

Fixed gender related terms throughout the guides


[H] Leveling

Hellfire Peninsula:

Added player tips

Added waypoints for additional quest mobs

Moved a guide step to improve guide flow

Added extra waypoints for better navigation between quests

Added a "Wanted" quest to the guide that was updated and is no longer an elite mob
